# Class: Inheritance
# Source: https://mermaid.js.org/syntax/classDiagram.html
classDiagram
    Animal <|-- Duck
    Animal <|-- Fish
    Animal <|-- Zebra
    Animal : +int age
    Animal : +String gender
    Animal: +isMammal()
    Animal: +mate()
    class Duck{
        +String beakColor
        +swim()
        +quack()
    }
    class Fish{
        -int sizeInFeet
        -canEat()
    }
    class Zebra{
        +bool is_wild
        +run()
    }
---

<text x="336.0" y="246.0" class="class-name" text-anchor="middle">Fish</text><line x1="256.0" y1="266.0" x2="416.0" y2="266.0" class="divider"/><text x="268.0" y="272.0" class="member">-sizeInFeet : int</text><line x1="256.0" y1="292.0" x2="416.0" y2="292.0" class="divider"/><text x="268.0" y="298.0" class="member">-canEat</text><rect x="476.0" y="220.0" width="144.0" height="124.0" class="node"/>
<text x="548.0" y="246.0" class="class-name" text-anchor="middle">Zebra</text><line x1="476.0" y1="266.0" x2="620.0" y2="266.0" class="divider"/><text x="488.0" y="272.0" class="member">+is_wild : bool</text><line x1="476.0" y1="292.0" x2="620.0" y2="292.0" class="divider"/><text x="488.0" y="298.0" class="member">+run</text></svg>
